snippet: In calling a Rutgers University student an “idiot,” Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey showed, again, the penchant for insults that has made him a polarizing figure at the state and national levels alike.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, known for his confrontational style of debate, says he does not regret calling Rutgers University student Bill Brown an 'idiot' at town hall meeting; Christie's public spat with Brown has drawn national attention and denunciations from Democrats across the state.
lead_paragraph: In calling a Rutgers University student an “idiot,” Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey showed, again, the penchant for insults that has made him a polarizing figure at the state and national levels alike.
